description: Discover how to cook the best BBQ chicken with a delicious mango marinade in just 30 minutes.
keywords: BBQ chicken,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Low sugar,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Summer,High protein,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch,Nikki P,Mango,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Barbecued Mango Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg skinless chicken thigh fillets, fat trimmed

recipeInstructions.text: Place mango, juice of 1 1/2 limes, oil, soy, sriracha, garlic and turmeric in a food processor, then season. Process until very smooth. Place half the mango mixture in a large bowl, then add chicken, turning to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 20 minutes to marinate, if time permits. Place remaining mango mixture in a small bowl and set aside.
Heat a greased barbecue grill on mediumhigh heat. Cook chicken for 4 minutes on each side or until charred and cooked through.Transfer to a large plate. Cover and rest for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook remaining lime halves, cutsides down, on barbecue grill for 2 minutes or until charred.
Top chicken with mint and serve with mango mixture and lime.
